about_the_game:
Chromatic Cruiser (CodeName PewPewV2 in Technical Preview)

Embark on an interstellar journey with Chromatic Cruiser, the ultimate space-themed rhythm shooter. As the captain of your own spaceship, you must master the art of shooting notes in time to the beat of the music, in order to keep the song playing. With a variety of challenging levels and different genres of music to choose from, you'll have to stay sharp and hit every note to progress through the game.

The game features an immersive, colorful and dynamic visual experience that will keep you engaged and entertained. Power-ups and special abilities will help you to overcome the challenges you'll face in the depths of space.

You can also customize your gameplay experience by importing your own songs or even play with other players online. Join the ranks of elite pilots and become the ultimate space-faring musician today with Chromatic Cruiser. This game is perfect for anyone who loves rhythm games and space ships.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 1909 (build 18363) +
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Blast off into rhythm gaming with Chromatic Cruiser! Navigate space, shoot notes & switch instrument tracks in time to the beat. Power-ups, custom songs & online multiplayer. Join the elite pilots and become a space-faring musician today!
